page.title: 09MY CHURCH-Joanne and David
page.content:
At St.Matthew's church there is a choir. The priest stands at the front with the vicar and the other priest.Usually I go to church with the Brownies and we stand at the back and when church starts there's one that carries the flag and one Brownie on each side.While the choir is singing the songs we walk down the centre. Joanne Larvin
David Channer My church is very big. At the beginning of every month we have a communion service.And every August 31st we have baptism. I am 10 years old and I do think there is such thing as Christ. The congregation is very big and I do think everyone should go there.I have got lots of friends and one of them got baptised. His name was Alan. I will get baptised next year.
